controls.title_es: Politicas de seguridad de la informacion
controls.description_en: Information security policy and topic-specific policies shall be defined, approved by management, published, communicated to and acknowledged by relevant personnel and relevant interested parties, and reviewed at planned intervals and if significant changes occur.
controls.description_de: Informationssicherheitsrichtlinien und themenspezifische Richtlinien sind zu definieren, von der Leitung zu genehmigen, zu veroffentlichen, an relevantes Personal und interessierte Parteien zu kommunizieren und in geplanten Intervallen zu uberprufen.
controls.guidance: Establish a hierarchy of policies with an overarching information security policy supported by topic-specific policies. Ensure regular review and update cycles.

controls.title_es: Roles y responsabilidades de seguridad de la informacion
controls.description_en: Information security roles and responsibilities shall be defined and allocated according to the organization needs.
controls.description_de: Rollen und Verantwortlichkeiten fur die Informationssicherheit sind entsprechend den Anforderungen der Organisation zu definieren und zuzuweisen.
controls.guidance: Define clear ownership for information security across the organization. Document roles in job descriptions and ensure accountability.

controls.description_en: Conflicting duties and conflicting areas of responsibility shall be segregated.
controls.description_de: Widerspruchliche Aufgaben und Verantwortungsbereiche sind zu trennen.
controls.guidance: Separate duties to prevent fraud and errors. No single person should control all aspects of a critical process.

controls.description_en: Management shall require all personnel to apply information security in accordance with the established information security policy and topic-specific policies and procedures of the organization.
controls.description_de: Die Leitung hat von allen Mitarbeitern zu fordern, dass sie die Informationssicherheit gemas der festgelegten Informationssicherheitsleitlinie anwenden.
controls.guidance: Management must demonstrate commitment and ensure resources are available for information security implementation.

controls.description_en: The organization shall establish and maintain contact with relevant authorities.
controls.description_de: Die Organisation hat Kontakte zu relevanten Behorden aufzubauen und zu pflegen.
controls.guidance: Maintain relationships with law enforcement, regulatory bodies, and other authorities. Know who to contact in case of incidents.

controls.title_es: Contacto con grupos de interes especial
controls.description_en: The organization shall establish and maintain contact with special interest groups or other specialist security forums and professional associations.
controls.description_de: Die Organisation hat Kontakte zu speziellen Interessengruppen oder anderen Fachforen fur Sicherheit aufzubauen und zu pflegen.
controls.guidance: Participate in ISACs, security forums, and professional associations to stay informed about threats and best practices.

controls.description_en: Information relating to information security threats shall be collected and analysed to produce threat intelligence.
controls.description_de: Informationen zu Bedrohungen der Informationssicherheit sind zu sammeln und zu analysieren, um Bedrohungsinformationen zu erzeugen.
controls.guidance: Implement threat intelligence feeds, analyze threat data, and integrate findings into security operations.

controls.title_es: Seguridad de la informacion en la gestion de proyectos
controls.description_en: Information security shall be integrated into project management.
controls.description_de: Informationssicherheit ist in das Projektmanagement zu integrieren.
controls.guidance: Include security requirements in all project phases. Conduct security reviews at key milestones.

controls.title_en: Inventory of information and other associated assets
controls.title_de: Inventar von Informationen und zugehorigen Vermogenswerten
controls.title_es: Inventario de informacion y otros activos asociados
controls.description_en: An inventory of information and other associated assets, including owners, shall be developed and maintained.
controls.description_de: Ein Inventar der Informationen und zugehorigen Vermogenswerte einschlieslich der Eigentumer ist zu entwickeln und zu pflegen.
controls.guidance: Maintain a comprehensive asset inventory including data, hardware, software, and intangible assets.

controls.title_en: Acceptable use of information and other associated assets
controls.title_de: Zulassige Nutzung von Informationen und zugehorigen Vermogenswerten
controls.title_es: Uso aceptable de la informacion y otros activos asociados
controls.description_en: Rules for the acceptable use of information and other associated assets shall be identified, documented and implemented.
controls.description_de: Regeln fur die zulassige Nutzung von Informationen und zugehorigen Vermogenswerten sind zu identifizieren, dokumentieren und umzusetzen.
controls.guidance: Define acceptable use policies for IT resources, data handling, and communication systems.

controls.description_en: Personnel and other interested parties as appropriate shall return all the organization's assets in their possession upon change or termination of their employment, contract or agreement.
controls.description_de: Mitarbeiter und andere interessierte Parteien haben alle Vermogenswerte der Organisation bei Anderung oder Beendigung ihres Verhaltnisses zuruckzugeben.
controls.guidance: Implement off-boarding procedures to ensure return of all physical and logical assets.

controls.description_en: Information shall be classified according to the information security needs of the organization based on confidentiality, integrity, availability and relevant interested party requirements.
controls.description_de: Informationen sind entsprechend den Informationssicherheitsbedurfnissen der Organisation zu klassifizieren.
controls.guidance: Establish classification scheme (e.g., Public, Internal, Confidential, Restricted) and apply consistently.

controls.description_en: An appropriate set of procedures for information labelling shall be developed and implemented in accordance with the information classification scheme adopted by the organization.
controls.description_de: Geeignete Verfahren zur Kennzeichnung von Informationen sind entsprechend dem Klassifizierungsschema zu entwickeln und umzusetzen.
controls.guidance: Apply visible labels to documents and implement metadata tagging for electronic information.

controls.description_en: Information transfer rules, procedures, or agreements shall be in place for all types of transfer facilities within the organization and between the organization and other parties.
controls.description_de: Regeln, Verfahren oder Vereinbarungen zur Informationsubertragung sind fur alle Ubertragungsmethoden zu etablieren.
controls.guidance: Define secure methods for information transfer including encryption requirements and approved channels.

controls.description_en: Rules to control physical and logical access to information and other associated assets shall be established and implemented based on business and information security requirements.
controls.description_de: Regeln zur Steuerung des physischen und logischen Zugangs zu Informationen sind zu etablieren und umzusetzen.
controls.guidance: Implement access control based on least privilege and need-to-know principles.

controls.description_en: The full life cycle of identities shall be managed.
controls.description_de: Der vollstandige Lebenszyklus von Identitaten ist zu verwalten.
controls.guidance: Implement identity lifecycle management including provisioning, modification, and de-provisioning.

controls.description_en: Allocation and management of authentication information shall be controlled by a management process, including advising personnel on appropriate handling of authentication information.
controls.description_de: Die Zuweisung und Verwaltung von Authentifizierungsinformationen ist durch einen Managementprozess zu steuern.
controls.guidance: Implement strong password policies, MFA where appropriate, and secure credential storage.

controls.description_en: Access rights to information and other associated assets shall be provisioned, reviewed, modified and removed in accordance with the organization's topic-specific policy on and rules for access control.
controls.description_de: Zugriffsrechte auf Informationen sind entsprechend den Richtlinien zu vergeben, uberprufen, andern und zu entziehen.
controls.guidance: Implement regular access reviews and automated provisioning/de-provisioning where possible.

controls.title_es: Seguridad de la informacion en relaciones con proveedores
controls.description_en: Processes and procedures shall be defined and implemented to manage the information security risks associated with the use of supplier's products or services.
controls.description_de: Prozesse zur Verwaltung der Informationssicherheitsrisiken im Zusammenhang mit der Nutzung von Lieferantenprodukten sind zu definieren.
controls.guidance: Conduct supplier security assessments, include security requirements in contracts, monitor compliance.

controls.title_en: Addressing information security within supplier agreements
controls.title_es: Tratamiento de la seguridad de la informacion en acuerdos con proveedores
controls.description_en: Relevant information security requirements shall be established and agreed with each supplier based on the type of supplier relationship.
controls.description_de: Relevante Informationssicherheitsanforderungen sind mit jedem Lieferanten zu vereinbaren.
controls.guidance: Include specific security requirements, audit rights, and incident notification obligations in contracts.

controls.title_en: Managing information security in the ICT supply chain
controls.title_de: Verwaltung der Informationssicherheit in der IKT-Lieferkette
controls.title_es: Gestion de la seguridad de la informacion en la cadena de suministro de TIC
controls.description_en: Processes and procedures shall be defined and implemented to manage the information security risks associated with the ICT products and services supply chain.
controls.description_de: Prozesse zur Verwaltung der Informationssicherheitsrisiken der IKT-Lieferkette sind zu definieren und umzusetzen.
controls.guidance: Assess supply chain risks, require security certifications, verify software integrity.

controls.title_en: Monitoring, review and change management of supplier services
controls.title_de: Uberwachung, Uberprufung und Anderungsmanagement von Lieferantenleistungen
controls.title_es: Monitoreo, revision y gestion de cambios de servicios de proveedores
controls.description_en: The organization shall regularly monitor, review, evaluate and manage change in supplier information security practices and service delivery.
controls.description_de: Die Organisation hat Lieferanten-Informationssicherheitspraktiken regelmasig zu uberwachen und zu uberprufen.
controls.guidance: Conduct periodic supplier security reviews, track SLA compliance, manage changes to supplier services.

controls.title_en: Information security for use of cloud services
controls.title_de: Informationssicherheit bei der Nutzung von Cloud-Diensten
controls.title_es: Seguridad de la informacion para el uso de servicios en la nube
controls.description_en: Processes for acquisition, use, management and exit from cloud services shall be established in accordance with the organization's information security requirements.
controls.description_de: Prozesse fur die Beschaffung, Nutzung, Verwaltung und den Ausstieg aus Cloud-Diensten sind zu etablieren.
controls.guidance: Evaluate cloud provider security, implement cloud security controls, plan for data portability.

controls.title_en: Information security incident management planning and preparation
controls.title_es: Planificacion y preparacion de la gestion de incidentes de seguridad de la informacion
controls.description_en: The organization shall plan and prepare for managing information security incidents by defining, establishing and communicating information security incident management processes, roles and responsibilities.
controls.description_de: Die Organisation hat die Verwaltung von Informationssicherheitsvorfallen zu planen und vorzubereiten.
controls.guidance: Establish incident response team, develop playbooks, conduct regular training and exercises.

controls.title_en: Assessment and decision on information security events
controls.title_es: Evaluacion y decision sobre eventos de seguridad de la informacion
controls.description_en: The organization shall assess information security events and decide if they are to be categorized as information security incidents.
controls.description_de: Die Organisation hat Informationssicherheitsereignisse zu bewerten und zu entscheiden, ob sie als Vorfalle einzustufen sind.
controls.guidance: Implement triage processes, define incident classification criteria, establish escalation procedures.

controls.title_es: Respuesta a incidentes de seguridad de la informacion
controls.description_en: Information security incidents shall be responded to in accordance with the documented procedures.
controls.description_de: Auf Informationssicherheitsvorfalle ist gemas dokumentierten Verfahren zu reagieren.
controls.guidance: Execute incident response procedures, contain threats, preserve evidence, communicate appropriately.

controls.title_es: Aprendizaje de incidentes de seguridad de la informacion
controls.description_en: Knowledge gained from information security incidents shall be used to strengthen and improve the information security controls.
controls.description_de: Erkenntnisse aus Informationssicherheitsvorfallen sind zur Verbesserung der Kontrollen zu nutzen.
controls.guidance: Conduct post-incident reviews, document lessons learned, update procedures and controls.

controls.description_en: The organization shall establish and implement procedures for the identification, collection, acquisition and preservation of evidence related to information security events.
controls.description_de: Die Organisation hat Verfahren fur die Identifikation, Sammlung und Sicherung von Beweismitteln zu etablieren.
controls.guidance: Implement forensic procedures, maintain chain of custody, use forensically sound tools.

controls.title_es: Seguridad de la informacion durante interrupciones
controls.description_en: The organization shall plan how to maintain information security at an appropriate level during disruption.
controls.description_de: Die Organisation hat zu planen, wie die Informationssicherheit bei Storungen auf angemessenem Niveau aufrechterhalten wird.
controls.guidance: Include security requirements in business continuity plans, maintain security during incidents.

controls.title_es: Preparacion de TIC para la continuidad del negocio
controls.description_en: ICT readiness shall be planned, implemented, maintained and tested based on business continuity objectives and ICT continuity requirements.
controls.description_de: Die IKT-Bereitschaft ist basierend auf Geschaftskontinuitatszielen zu planen, umzusetzen und zu testen.
controls.guidance: Develop IT disaster recovery plans, define RTOs/RPOs, conduct regular DR testing.

controls.title_en: Legal, statutory, regulatory and contractual requirements
controls.title_es: Requisitos legales, estatutarios, regulatorios y contractuales
controls.description_en: Legal, statutory, regulatory and contractual requirements relevant to information security and the organization's approach to meet these requirements shall be identified, documented and kept up to date.
controls.description_de: Gesetzliche, regulatorische und vertragliche Anforderungen sind zu identifizieren, dokumentieren und aktuell zu halten.
controls.guidance: Maintain compliance register, track regulatory changes, ensure legal advice is available.

controls.description_en: The organization shall implement appropriate procedures to protect intellectual property rights.
controls.description_de: Die Organisation hat geeignete Verfahren zum Schutz geistiger Eigentumsrechte umzusetzen.
controls.guidance: Track software licenses, protect proprietary information, respect third-party IP rights.

controls.description_en: Records shall be protected from loss, destruction, falsification, unauthorized access and unauthorized release in accordance with legal, statutory, regulatory and contractual requirements.
controls.description_de: Aufzeichnungen sind vor Verlust, Zerstorung, Falschung und unbefugtem Zugriff zu schutzen.
controls.guidance: Implement records management, define retention periods, ensure secure storage and disposal.

controls.title_es: Privacidad y proteccion de datos personales
controls.description_en: The organization shall identify and meet the requirements regarding the preservation of privacy and protection of PII as required in relevant legislation and regulation and contractual requirements.
controls.description_de: Die Organisation hat Anforderungen bezuglich Datenschutz und Schutz personenbezogener Daten zu identifizieren und einzuhalten.
controls.guidance: Implement privacy by design, conduct DPIAs, appoint DPO if required, ensure lawful processing.

controls.title_es: Revision independiente de la seguridad de la informacion
controls.description_en: The organization's approach to managing information security and its implementation shall be reviewed independently at planned intervals, or when significant changes occur.
controls.description_de: Der Ansatz der Organisation zur Verwaltung der Informationssicherheit ist unabhangig zu uberprufen.
controls.guidance: Conduct internal audits, engage external auditors, review ISMS effectiveness regularly.

controls.title_en: Compliance with policies, rules and standards for information security
controls.title_de: Einhaltung von Richtlinien, Regeln und Standards fur Informationssicherheit
controls.title_es: Cumplimiento de politicas, reglas y estandares de seguridad de la informacion
controls.description_en: Compliance with the organization's information security policy, topic-specific policies, rules and standards shall be regularly reviewed.
controls.description_de: Die Einhaltung der Informationssicherheitsrichtlinien ist regelmasig zu uberprufen.
controls.guidance: Conduct compliance assessments, track exceptions, report on compliance status.

controls.description_en: Operating procedures for information processing facilities shall be documented and made available to personnel who need them.
controls.description_de: Betriebsverfahren fur Informationsverarbeitungseinrichtungen sind zu dokumentieren und bereitzustellen.
controls.guidance: Document procedures for routine operations, make accessible to relevant personnel, keep updated.

controls.description_en: Background verification checks on all candidates for employment shall be carried out prior to joining the organization and on an ongoing basis taking into consideration applicable laws, regulations and ethics.
controls.description_de: Hintergrundprufungen aller Bewerber sind vor der Einstellung und fortlaufend durchzufuhren.
controls.guidance: Conduct background checks appropriate to role sensitivity, verify credentials and references.

controls.description_en: The employment contractual agreements shall state the personnel's and the organization's responsibilities for information security.
controls.description_de: Arbeitsvertrage haben die Verantwortlichkeiten fur Informationssicherheit festzulegen.
controls.guidance: Include security responsibilities, confidentiality obligations, and acceptable use terms in contracts.

controls.title_en: Information security awareness, education and training
controls.title_es: Concienciacion, educacion y formacion en seguridad de la informacion
controls.description_en: Personnel of the organization and relevant interested parties shall receive appropriate information security awareness, education and training and regular updates of the organization's information security policy and topic-specific policies and procedures.
controls.description_de: Mitarbeiter sind entsprechend zu sensibilisieren, auszubilden und zu schulen.
controls.guidance: Provide role-based training, conduct phishing simulations, track training completion.

controls.description_en: A disciplinary process shall be formalized and communicated to take actions against personnel who have committed an information security policy violation.
controls.description_de: Ein Disziplinarverfahren ist zu formalisieren und zu kommunizieren.
controls.guidance: Define consequences for policy violations, ensure fair and consistent enforcement.

controls.title_en: Responsibilities after termination or change of employment
controls.title_de: Verantwortlichkeiten nach Beendigung oder Anderung des Arbeitsverhaltnisses
controls.title_es: Responsabilidades tras la terminacion o cambio de empleo
controls.description_en: Information security responsibilities and duties that remain valid after termination or change of employment shall be defined, enforced and communicated.
controls.description_de: Informationssicherheitsverantwortlichkeiten nach Beendigung des Arbeitsverhaltnisses sind zu definieren.
controls.guidance: Define post-employment obligations, enforce NDAs, manage knowledge transfer.

controls.title_es: Acuerdos de confidencialidad o no divulgacion
controls.description_en: Confidentiality or non-disclosure agreements reflecting the organization's needs for the protection of information shall be identified, documented, regularly reviewed and signed by personnel and other relevant interested parties.
controls.description_de: Vertraulichkeitsvereinbarungen sind zu identifizieren, dokumentieren und regelmasig zu uberprufen.
controls.guidance: Implement NDAs for employees, contractors, and third parties with access to sensitive information.

controls.description_en: Security measures shall be implemented when personnel are working remotely to protect information accessed, processed or stored outside the organization's premises.
controls.description_de: Sicherheitsmasnahmen sind fur Fernarbeit umzusetzen, um Informationen ausserhalb der Organisation zu schutzen.
controls.guidance: Define remote work policy, require VPN, ensure secure home office setup, protect mobile devices.

controls.title_es: Notificacion de eventos de seguridad de la informacion
controls.description_en: The organization shall provide a mechanism for personnel to report observed or suspected information security events through appropriate channels in a timely manner.
controls.description_de: Die Organisation hat einen Mechanismus zur Meldung von Informationssicherheitsereignissen bereitzustellen.
controls.guidance: Establish reporting channels, encourage reporting culture, protect reporters from retaliation.

controls.description_en: Security perimeters shall be defined and used to protect areas that contain information and other associated assets.
controls.description_de: Sicherheitsperimeter sind zu definieren und zum Schutz von Bereichen mit Informationen zu verwenden.
controls.guidance: Define secure areas, implement access controls, monitor perimeters.

controls.description_en: Secure areas shall be protected by appropriate entry controls to ensure only authorized personnel are allowed access.
controls.description_de: Sichere Bereiche sind durch geeignete Zutrittskontrollen zu schutzen.
controls.guidance: Implement access control systems, verify identity, log access attempts.

controls.title_de: Sicherung von Buros, Raumen und Einrichtungen
controls.title_es: Aseguramiento de oficinas, salas e instalaciones
controls.description_en: Physical security for offices, rooms and facilities shall be designed and implemented.
controls.description_de: Physische Sicherheit fur Buros, Raume und Einrichtungen ist zu entwerfen und umzusetzen.
controls.guidance: Implement appropriate security controls based on asset value and risk assessment.

controls.description_en: Premises shall be continuously monitored for unauthorized physical access.
controls.description_de: Raumlichkeiten sind kontinuierlich auf unbefugten physischen Zugang zu uberwachen.
controls.guidance: Implement CCTV, intrusion detection, security guards as appropriate.

controls.title_en: Protecting against physical and environmental threats
controls.title_de: Schutz vor physischen und umweltbedingten Bedrohungen
controls.title_es: Proteccion contra amenazas fisicas y ambientales
controls.description_en: Protection against physical and environmental threats shall be designed and implemented.
controls.description_de: Schutz vor physischen und umweltbedingten Bedrohungen ist zu entwerfen und umzusetzen.
controls.guidance: Assess and mitigate risks from fire, flood, earthquake, and other environmental threats.

controls.description_en: Security measures for working in secure areas shall be designed and implemented.
controls.description_de: Sicherheitsmasnahmen fur das Arbeiten in Sicherheitsbereichen sind zu entwerfen und umzusetzen.
controls.guidance: Define rules for secure areas, supervise visitors, restrict photography and recording.

controls.description_en: Clear desk rules for papers and removable storage media and clear screen rules for information processing facilities shall be defined and appropriately enforced.
controls.description_de: Regeln fur aufgeraumte Schreibtische und Bildschirme sind zu definieren und durchzusetzen.
controls.guidance: Lock screens when away, secure documents, use privacy screens.

controls.description_en: Equipment shall be sited securely and protected.
controls.description_de: Betriebsmittel sind sicher zu platzieren und zu schutzen.
controls.guidance: Position equipment to minimize unauthorized access and environmental damage risks.

controls.title_de: Sicherheit von Vermogenswerten ausserhalb der Raumlichkeiten
controls.title_es: Seguridad de activos fuera de las instalaciones
controls.description_en: Off-site assets shall be protected.
controls.description_de: Ausser Haus befindliche Vermogenswerte sind zu schutzen.
controls.guidance: Implement protection for mobile devices and equipment used off-site.

controls.description_en: Storage media shall be managed through their life cycle of acquisition, use, transportation and disposal in accordance with the organization's classification scheme and handling requirements.
controls.description_de: Speichermedien sind uber ihren Lebenszyklus gemas Klassifizierungsschema zu verwalten.
controls.guidance: Implement secure handling, encryption, and disposal of storage media.

controls.description_en: Information processing facilities shall be protected from power failures and other disruptions caused by failures in supporting utilities.
controls.description_de: Informationsverarbeitungseinrichtungen sind vor Stromausfall und anderen Storungen zu schutzen.
controls.guidance: Implement UPS, redundant power, and environmental controls.

controls.description_en: Cables carrying power and data or supporting information services shall be protected from interception, interference or damage.
controls.description_de: Kabel fur Strom und Daten sind vor Abhoren, Storung oder Beschadigung zu schutzen.
controls.guidance: Protect cables physically, use fiber optics where appropriate, implement cable management.

controls.description_en: Equipment shall be maintained correctly to ensure availability, integrity and confidentiality of information.
controls.description_de: Betriebsmittel sind ordnungsgemas instand zu halten.
controls.guidance: Schedule regular maintenance, use authorized personnel, verify security after maintenance.

controls.title_en: Secure disposal or re-use of equipment
controls.title_de: Sichere Entsorgung oder Wiederverwendung von Betriebsmitteln
controls.title_es: Eliminacion o reutilizacion segura de equipos
controls.description_en: Items of equipment containing storage media shall be verified to ensure that any sensitive data and licensed software has been removed or securely overwritten prior to disposal or re-use.
controls.description_de: Betriebsmittel mit Speichermedien sind vor Entsorgung oder Wiederverwendung zu prufen.
controls.guidance: Implement secure data destruction procedures, verify complete erasure, document disposal.

controls.title_es: Dispositivos de punto final de usuario
controls.description_en: Information stored on, processed by or accessible via user endpoint devices shall be protected.
controls.description_de: Informationen auf Benutzerendgeraten sind zu schutzen.
controls.guidance: Implement endpoint security, encryption, remote wipe capabilities.

controls.description_en: The allocation and use of privileged access rights shall be restricted and managed.
controls.description_de: Die Zuweisung und Nutzung privilegierter Zugriffsrechte ist einzuschranken und zu verwalten.
controls.guidance: Implement PAM solutions, just-in-time access, monitor privileged sessions.

controls.title_es: Restriccion del acceso a la informacion
controls.description_en: Access to information and other associated assets shall be restricted in accordance with the established topic-specific policy on access control.
controls.description_de: Der Zugriff auf Informationen ist gemas Richtlinie einzuschranken.
controls.guidance: Implement access controls at application, data, and network levels.

controls.description_en: Read and write access to source code, development tools and software libraries shall be appropriately managed.
controls.description_de: Lese- und Schreibzugriff auf Quellcode ist angemessen zu verwalten.
controls.guidance: Implement version control, restrict access, conduct code reviews.

controls.description_en: Secure authentication technologies and procedures shall be implemented based on information access restrictions and the topic-specific policy on access control.
controls.description_de: Sichere Authentifizierungstechnologien und -verfahren sind umzusetzen.
controls.guidance: Implement MFA, strong passwords, secure authentication protocols.

controls.description_en: The use of resources shall be monitored and adjusted in line with current and expected capacity requirements.
controls.description_de: Die Nutzung von Ressourcen ist zu uberwachen und anzupassen.
controls.guidance: Monitor capacity, plan for growth, implement auto-scaling where appropriate.

controls.description_en: Protection against malware shall be implemented and supported by appropriate user awareness.
controls.description_de: Schutz vor Schadsoftware ist umzusetzen und durch Benutzersensibilisierung zu unterstutzen.
controls.guidance: Deploy anti-malware solutions, keep signatures updated, educate users.

controls.description_en: Information about technical vulnerabilities of information systems in use shall be obtained, the organization's exposure to such vulnerabilities shall be evaluated and appropriate measures shall be taken.
controls.description_de: Informationen uber technische Schwachstellen sind zu beschaffen und geeignete Masnahmen zu ergreifen.
controls.guidance: Implement vulnerability scanning, patch management, and remediation tracking.

controls.description_en: Configurations, including security configurations, of hardware, software, services and networks shall be established, documented, implemented, monitored and reviewed.
controls.description_de: Konfigurationen einschlieslich Sicherheitskonfigurationen sind zu etablieren und zu dokumentieren.
controls.guidance: Implement configuration baselines, change control, and compliance monitoring.

controls.description_en: Information stored in information systems, devices or in any other storage media shall be deleted when no longer required.
controls.description_de: Informationen sind zu loschen, wenn sie nicht mehr benotigt werden.
controls.guidance: Implement data retention policies, secure deletion procedures, verify deletion.

controls.description_en: Data masking shall be used in accordance with the organization's topic-specific policy on access control and other related topic-specific policies, and business requirements.
controls.description_de: Datenmaskierung ist entsprechend der Richtlinien zu verwenden.
controls.guidance: Mask sensitive data in non-production environments and displays as appropriate.

controls.description_en: Data leakage prevention measures shall be applied to systems, networks and any other devices that process, store or transmit sensitive information.
controls.description_de: Masnahmen zur Verhinderung von Datenlecks sind auf Systeme anzuwenden.
controls.guidance: Implement DLP solutions, monitor data flows, block unauthorized transfers.

controls.title_es: Copias de seguridad de la informacion
controls.description_en: Backup copies of information, software and systems shall be maintained and regularly tested in accordance with the agreed topic-specific policy on backup.
controls.description_de: Sicherungskopien von Informationen, Software und Systemen sind zu pflegen und regelmasig zu testen.
controls.guidance: Implement 3-2-1 backup strategy, test restores regularly, protect backup data.

controls.title_es: Redundancia de instalaciones de procesamiento de informacion
controls.description_en: Information processing facilities shall be implemented with redundancy sufficient to meet availability requirements.
controls.description_de: Informationsverarbeitungseinrichtungen sind mit ausreichender Redundanz umzusetzen.
controls.guidance: Implement failover, clustering, and geographic redundancy as appropriate.

controls.description_en: Logs that record activities, exceptions, faults and other relevant events shall be produced, stored, protected and analysed.
controls.description_de: Protokolle uber Aktivitaten, Ausnahmen und Fehler sind zu erstellen, zu speichern und zu analysieren.
controls.guidance: Implement centralized logging, log retention, and log analysis.

controls.description_en: Networks, systems and applications shall be monitored for anomalous behaviour and appropriate actions taken to evaluate potential information security incidents.
controls.description_de: Netzwerke, Systeme und Anwendungen sind auf anomales Verhalten zu uberwachen.
controls.guidance: Implement SIEM, IDS/IPS, and behavioral analytics.

controls.description_en: The clocks of information processing systems used by the organization shall be synchronized to approved time sources.
controls.description_de: Die Uhren von Informationsverarbeitungssystemen sind mit genehmigten Zeitquellen zu synchronisieren.
controls.guidance: Implement NTP, use multiple time sources, monitor synchronization.

controls.description_en: The use of utility programs that might be capable of overriding system and application controls shall be restricted and tightly controlled.
controls.description_de: Die Verwendung von Dienstprogrammen, die Kontrollen umgehen konnen, ist einzuschranken.
controls.guidance: Restrict access to privileged tools, log usage, remove unnecessary utilities.

controls.title_en: Installation of software on operational systems
controls.title_es: Instalacion de software en sistemas operativos
controls.description_en: Procedures and measures shall be implemented to securely manage software installation on operational systems.
controls.description_de: Verfahren zur sicheren Verwaltung der Softwareinstallation sind umzusetzen.
controls.guidance: Implement software whitelisting, approval processes, and installation controls.

controls.description_en: Networks and network devices shall be secured, managed and controlled to protect information in systems and applications.
controls.description_de: Netzwerke und Netzwerkgerate sind zu sichern, verwalten und kontrollieren.
controls.guidance: Implement network segmentation, firewall rules, and network monitoring.

controls.description_en: Security mechanisms, service levels and service requirements of network services shall be identified, implemented and monitored.
controls.description_de: Sicherheitsmechanismen und Anforderungen von Netzwerkdiensten sind zu identifizieren und umzusetzen.
controls.guidance: Define security requirements for network services, monitor service levels.

controls.description_en: Groups of information services, users and information systems shall be segregated in the organization's networks.
controls.description_de: Gruppen von Informationsdiensten, Benutzern und Systemen sind in Netzwerken zu trennen.
controls.guidance: Implement network segmentation, VLANs, and micro-segmentation.

controls.description_en: Access to external websites shall be managed to reduce exposure to malicious content.
controls.description_de: Der Zugang zu externen Websites ist zu verwalten, um die Exposition gegenuber bosartigem Inhalt zu verringern.
controls.guidance: Implement web proxy, URL filtering, and SSL inspection.

controls.description_en: Rules for the effective use of cryptography, including cryptographic key management, shall be defined and implemented.
controls.description_de: Regeln fur die effektive Verwendung von Kryptographie sind zu definieren und umzusetzen.
controls.guidance: Implement encryption standards, key management procedures, and crypto agility.

controls.title_es: Ciclo de vida de desarrollo seguro
controls.description_en: Rules for the secure development of software and systems shall be established and applied.
controls.description_de: Regeln fur die sichere Entwicklung von Software und Systemen sind festzulegen und anzuwenden.
controls.guidance: Implement SDLC security practices, security requirements, and secure coding guidelines.

controls.description_en: Information security requirements shall be identified, specified and approved when developing or acquiring applications.
controls.description_de: Informationssicherheitsanforderungen sind bei der Entwicklung oder Beschaffung zu identifizieren und zu genehmigen.
controls.guidance: Define security requirements early, conduct threat modeling, verify implementation.

controls.title_en: Secure system architecture and engineering principles
controls.title_es: Arquitectura de sistema segura y principios de ingenieria
controls.description_en: Principles for engineering secure systems shall be established, documented, maintained and applied to any information system development activities.
controls.description_de: Grundsatze fur sichere Systemtechnik sind festzulegen und auf Entwicklungsaktivitaten anzuwenden.
controls.guidance: Implement defense in depth, least privilege, and secure design patterns.

controls.description_en: Secure coding principles shall be applied to software development.
controls.description_de: Grundsatze des sicheren Kodierens sind auf die Softwareentwicklung anzuwenden.
controls.guidance: Follow OWASP guidelines, conduct code reviews, use static analysis tools.

controls.title_en: Security testing in development and acceptance
controls.title_es: Pruebas de seguridad en desarrollo y aceptacion
controls.description_en: Security testing processes shall be defined and implemented in the development life cycle.
controls.description_de: Sicherheitstestprozesse sind im Entwicklungslebenszyklus zu definieren und umzusetzen.
controls.guidance: Implement security testing including SAST, DAST, and penetration testing.

controls.description_en: The organization shall direct, monitor and review the activities related to outsourced system development.
controls.description_de: Die Organisation hat ausgelagerte Systementwicklung zu uberwachen und zu uberprufen.
controls.guidance: Include security requirements in contracts, conduct code reviews, verify security testing.

controls.title_en: Separation of development, test and production environments
controls.title_de: Trennung von Entwicklungs-, Test- und Produktionsumgebungen
controls.title_es: Separacion de entornos de desarrollo, prueba y produccion
controls.description_en: Development, testing and production environments shall be separated and secured.
controls.description_de: Entwicklungs-, Test- und Produktionsumgebungen sind zu trennen und zu sichern.
controls.guidance: Implement environment segregation, protect production data, control promotions.

controls.description_en: Changes to information processing facilities and information systems shall be subject to change management procedures.
controls.description_de: Anderungen an Informationsverarbeitungseinrichtungen sind Anderungsmanagementverfahren zu unterwerfen.
controls.guidance: Implement change control processes, assess security impact, maintain audit trail.

controls.description_en: Test information shall be appropriately selected, protected and managed.
controls.description_de: Testinformationen sind angemessen auszuwahlen, zu schutzen und zu verwalten.
controls.guidance: Use synthetic data, mask production data, protect test data appropriately.

controls.title_en: Protection of information systems during audit testing
controls.title_es: Proteccion de sistemas de informacion durante pruebas de auditoria
controls.description_en: Audit tests and other assurance activities involving assessment of operational systems shall be planned and agreed.
controls.description_de: Auditprufungen von Betriebssystemen sind zu planen und zu vereinbaren.
controls.guidance: Plan audits carefully, minimize disruption, protect audit tools and results.
